alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 9:16PM CDT until June 12 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Northeastern Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 916 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Brundidge to New Brockton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Rucker, Ozark, Enterprise, Newton, New Brockton, Ariton, Pinckard, Mixons Crossroads, Hunt Field, Waterford, Dill, Hooper Stage Field, Lowry Mill, Mabson, Arguta, Clintonville, Ewell, Roeton, Dale County Lake and Marley Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
